content: this legal text is about a case involving the coownership of a threebedroom apartment the court decided to dissolve the coownership and allocate equal shares of the property to the petitioner the petitioner was asked to pay a certain amount of money to the counterparty representing their coownership share the court determined that the petitioners owned 68 shares and the counterparty owned 28 shares the court conducted an expert examination to determine the value of the property and accepted the petitioners proposal to dissolve the coownership and pay the counterpartys share the court also established a lien on the property in favor of the counterparty the counterparty appealed the decision but it was ultimately affirmed by the court
